title: I got placed in low priority queue again...but
body:
Hello;

**I know that leaverbuster gets you when you be afk in more games**, I did the 5 games awaiting time and finished a day ago, and I played normal today just the previous match (with Lux) when I got DC (bugsplat), the client repaired and got back into game normally, when finished the system got me a pop-up for leaverbuster, I mean I don't get it after my 5 times queue it's supposed to reset.

The bugsplat is the reason for my afk in early game, but this is not the issue here.

Was LB changed in this patch or something?

replies.body:
There weren't any changes to leaverbuster in this latest patch. It looks like you may have afk'd in another match only 2 games after finishing out the low priority queue you were in. 

It generally won't happen if you don't leave matches frequently, but if you do you _can_ get hit with LPQ again after only 1-2 games. Be sure to check all the details on [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q2)
Got it and thank you for the quick reply ^^
